1: When the Lord gave the riches back to Jerusalem, it seemed as if we were dreaming.
2: Then we were filled with laughter, and we sang happy songs. Then the other nations said, “The Lord has done great things for them.”
3: The Lord has done great things for us, and we are very glad.
4: Lord, give us back our riches again. Do this as you bring streams to the desert.
5: Those who cry as they plant crops will sing at harvesttime.
6: Those who cry as they carry out the seeds will return singing and carrying bundles of grain.
